quotes.quote: Wishing you a good night's sleep, sweet dreams, and a morning full of love and happiness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night, sleep tight. I will be dreaming of you with all my might.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The darker the night, the brighter the stars, the deeper the grief, the closer is God!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Night is the wonderful opportunity to take rest, to forgive, to smile, to get ready for all the battles that you have to fight tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. May your dreams be filled with stars and angels.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. Look up, we are both under the same starry sky.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The night is the hardest time to be alive and 4am knows all my secrets.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Sleep is the best therapy.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good night. Don't let the bedbugs bite.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Night is the blotting paper for many sorrows.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may not touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Love is a language spoken by everyone, but understood only by the heart.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest gift that one generation can leave to another.
quotes.author: Richard Garnett

quotes.quote: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
quotes.author: David Wilkerson

quotes.quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Love is when you look into someone's eyes and see everything you need.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

quotes.quote: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may not touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Love is a language spoken by everyone, but understood only by the heart.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest gift that one generation can leave to another.
quotes.author: Richard Garnett

quotes.quote: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
quotes.author: David Wilkerson

quotes.quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Love is when you look into someone's eyes and see everything you need.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the sweetest thing in a seeker's life - in all human life. If there is gratitude in your heart, then there will be tremendous sweetness in your eyes.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: Thank you for your thoughtfulness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the memory of the heart.
quotes.author: Jean Baptiste Massieu

quotes.quote: Thank you for your friendship and support.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Thank you for always going above and beyond.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions. The more you express gratitude for what you have, the more likely you will have even more to express gratitude for.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Thank you for your generosity and support.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all others.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Thank you for being an amazing person.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Social media is the new way of communication, and it is everywhere; it changes the world and individual's lives.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Social media is about the people! Not about your business. Provide for the people and the people will provide for you.
quotes.author: Matt Goulart

quotes.quote: Social media is not just an activity; it is an investment of valuable time and resources.
quotes.author: Sean Gardner

quotes.quote: Social media is not a sales pitch. It's a conversation.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Social media is the new way of communication, and it is everywhere; it changes the world and individual's lives.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Social media is changing the way we communicate and the way we are perceived, both positively and negatively.
quotes.author: Amy Jo Martin

quotes.quote: Social media is not a media. The key is to listen, engage, and build relationships.
quotes.author: David Alston

quotes.quote: Social media is about the people! Not about your business. Provide for the people and the people will provide for you.
quotes.author: Matt Goulart

quotes.quote: Social media is about sociology and psychology more than technology.
quotes.author: Brian Solis

quotes.quote: Social media is not a one-time thing. It's a daily, ongoing commitment.
quotes.author: Kathleen A. Kearns

quotes.quote: The world is my idea.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: If you would be a real seeker after truth, it is necessary that at least once in your life you doubt, as far as possible, all things.
quotes.author: René Descartes

quotes.quote: I can control my passions and emotions if I can understand their nature.
quotes.author: Spinoza

quotes.quote: The function of man is to live, not to exist.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: The only thing I know is that I know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: There is only one good, knowledge, and one evil, ignorance.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The life of man is of no greater importance to the universe than that of an oyster.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: The limits of my language mean the limits of my world.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: To be is to be perceived.
quotes.author: George Berkeley

quotes.quote: Each age has deemed the new-born year the fittest time for festal cheer.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: What the new year brings to you will depend a great deal on what you bring to the new year.
quotes.author: Vern McLellan

quotes.quote: The new year stands before us, like a chapter in a book, waiting to be written. We can help write that story by setting goals.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Ring out the old, ring in the new.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The new year stands before us, like a chapter in a book, waiting to be written.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: We will open the book. Its pages are blank. We are going to put words on them ourselves. The book is called Opportunity and its first chapter is New Year's Day.
quotes.author: Edith Lovejoy Pierce

quotes.quote: The object of a new year is not that we should have a new year. It is that we should have a new soul.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: For last year's words belong to last year's language and next year's words await another voice.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The poetry of the earth is never dead.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: The mountains are calling, and I must go.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: The richness I achieve comes from Nature, the source of my inspiration.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: Keep close to Nature's heart... and break clear away, once in a while, and climb a mountain or spend a week in the woods. Wash your spirit clean.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: To sit in the shade on a fine day and look upon the verdant green hills is the most perfect refreshment.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The poetry of the earth is never dead.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: The mountains are calling, and I must go.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: The richness I achieve comes from Nature, the source of my inspiration.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: Keep close to Nature's heart... and break clear away, once in a while, and climb a mountain or spend a week in the woods. Wash your spirit clean.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: To sit in the shade on a fine day and look upon the verdant green hills is the most perfect refreshment.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the art of counting someone else's blessings instead of your own.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Jealousy is both reasonable and belongs to reasonable men, while envy is base and belongs to the base, for the one makes himself get good things by jealousy, while the other does not allow his neighbour to have them through envy.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Jealousy is a wasted emotion.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the dragon in paradise; the hell of heaven; and the most bitter of the emotions because associated with the sweetest.
quotes.author: A.R. Orage

quotes.quote: Jealousy is never satisfied with anything short of an omniscience that would detect the subtlest fold of the heart.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Jealousy is all the fun you think they had.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Jealousy is simply and clearly the fear that you do not have value. Jealousy scans for evidence to prove the point - that others will be preferred and rewarded more than you. There is only one alternative - self-value. If you cannot love yourself, you will not believe that you are loved. You will always think it's a mistake or luck. Take your eyes off others and turn the scanner within. Find the seeds of your jealousy, clear the old voices and experiences. Put all the energy into building your personal and emotional security. Then you will be the one others envy, and you can remember the pain and reach out to them.
quotes.author: Jennifer James

quotes.quote: Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy - in fact, they are almost incompatible; one emotion hardly leaves room for the other.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the fear of comparison.
quotes.author: Max Frisch

quotes.quote: Jealousy is the jaundice of the soul.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: God is the ultimate judge.
quotes.author: Romans 14:12

quotes.quote: God is the rock of salvation.
quotes.author: Psalm 89:26

quotes.quote: God is the giver of life.
quotes.author: Genesis 2:7

quotes.quote: God's word is a lamp to our feet.
quotes.author: Psalm 119:105

quotes.quote: God is love, and whoever abides in love abides in God.
quotes.author: 1 John 4:16

quotes.quote: God is the healer of the brokenhearted.
quotes.author: Psalm 147:3

quotes.quote: God's strength is made perfect in weakness.
quotes.author: 2 Corinthians 12:9

quotes.quote: God is the giver of peace.
quotes.author: John 14:27

quotes.quote: God is the redeemer of all things.
quotes.author: Job 19:25

quotes.quote: God is the provider of all our needs.
quotes.author: Philippians 4:19

quotes.quote: I'm not old, I'm vintage.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not weird, I'm limited edition.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I don't need a hairstylist, my pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not clumsy, the floor just hates me.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not short, I'm concentrated awesome.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not a complete idiot, some parts are missing.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I put the 'pro' in procrastination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I don't sweat, I sparkle.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in their dreams.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Dreams are not what you see in your sleep, dreams are things which do not let you sleep.
quotes.author: Dr. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: The only thing that will stop you from fulfilling your dreams is you.
quotes.author: Tom Bradley

quotes.quote: Don't let small minds convince you that your dreams are too big.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Christmas is the day that holds all time together.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Christmas is a season not only of rejoicing but of reflection.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Christmas is not a time nor a season, but a state of mind. To cherish peace and goodwill, to be plenteous in mercy, is to have the real spirit of Christmas.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Christmas is the spirit of giving without a thought of getting. It is happiness because we see joy in people. It is forgetting self and finding time for others. It is discarding the meaningless and stressing the true values.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
quotes.author: Dale Evans

quotes.quote: Christmas is doing a little something extra for someone.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Christmas is a season of joy, love, and sharing with family and friends.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Christmas is a time when you get homesick — even when you're home.
quotes.author: Carol Nelson

quotes.quote: Christmas is not just a time for festivity and merry making. It is more than that. It is a time for the contemplation of eternal things. The Christmas spirit is a spirit of giving and forgiving.
quotes.author: J.C. Penney

quotes.quote: Christmas is not as much about opening our presents as opening our hearts.
quotes.author: Janice Maeditere

quotes.quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years.
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.quote: An anniversary is a reminder as to why you love and married this person.
quotes.author: Zoe Foster Blake

quotes.quote: True love stories never have endings.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is to love and be loved in return.
quotes.author: Nat King Cole

quotes.quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance, and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.quote: The secret to a happy marriage is if you can be at peace with someone within four walls, if you are content because the one you love is near to you, either upstairs or downstairs, or in the same room, and you feel that warmth that you don't find very often, then that is what love is all about.
quotes.author: Bruce Forsyth

quotes.quote: The bonds of matrimony are like any other bonds - they mature slowly.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance, and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.quote: A successful marriage isn't the union of two perfect people. It's that of two imperfect people who have learned the value of forgiveness and grace.
quotes.author: Darlene Schacht

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings and the one that we take the least thought about acquiring.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Friendship is born when two people discover they aren't alone in the world.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you, during both the good times and the bad times.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Success is not about being the best. It's about being better than you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Herman Cain

quotes.quote: Success is not about the destination, it's about the journey.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to success. You have to fail and learn from your failures.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is not about being the best. It's about being better than you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson
